name: DogMurai: The Code's Best Friend
description:
A game made by a team of junior developers at Uppsala University for the shoot em' up project. 

You, Momo, a brave honor driven dog are set on protecting your farm… but those that are threatening your livestock are your own, fellow dogs. Navigate the harsh environment to find lost animals, but be weary of hurting your kin, you wouldn’t want to be labeled a killer after-all. 

This action packed adventure… all takes place in your mind. And your mind is a wild place, with many weird perceptions. I mean; you see yourself as a noble samurai!!?

Credits -
Lead programmer: Eri Kutrolli
Assistant programmer: William Palm
Graphics: Levi Hammelef, Vicente Cornejo, Yum (Martina Edfast)
Assistant graphics:  Dylan Slammert
QA: Dylan Slammert
Project manager: William Palm
